title: Tobi Bakre
text:
Tobi Bakre (born 1 June 1994) is a Nigerian actor, model, host, <a href="Compere%20%28host%29">compere</a>, and photographer. Tobi rose to fame after finishing up as a finalist in the <a href="Big%20Brother%20Naija%20%28season%203%29">Big Brother Naija (season 3)</a> reality TV show in 2018.
Early life and education.
Tobi was born into the family of four children, among which include his older brother, Femi Bakre, CEO of Kraks TV and 
two sisters. He earned his <a href="Undergraduate%20degree">Bachelor's degree</a> at the <a href="University%20of%20Lagos">University of Lagos</a> where he graduated with a <a href="Second%20Class%20Honours">Second Class Honours</a> Upper Division in Banking and Finance.
Career.
Tobi used to be an investment banker having worked in the office of the <a href="Accountant%20General%20of%20the%20Federation">Accountant General of the Federation</a> and in the banking industry for four years. He participated in the <a href="Big%20Brother%20Naija%20%28season%203%29">Big Brother Naija (season 3)</a> reality TV show.
He's <a href="brand%20ambassador">brand ambassador</a> to <a href="Unilever">Unilever</a>, Amstel Malta, and <a href="Jumia">Jumia</a> in and out of Nigeria.
